Description: Sure Men Active Dry Anti-perspirant Deodorant Aerosol, from the UK's No.1 anti-perspirant brand, has been developed to give you cutting-edge protection against sweat and odour. With Sure, you're always protected for whatever happens. It also contains Sure’s innovative MotionSense technology. It works like this: unique microcapsules sit on the surface of your skin. When you move, friction breaks those microcapsules, and they release more fragrance. Every time you move, MotionSense keeps you fresh and free from odour. Whether you’re working hard in the office, playing hard out and about or just meeting up with friends, Sure Men Active Dry will give you all the back-up you need. Sure. It won't let you down. This anti-perspirant deodorant spray has an all-day fresh and airy fragrance with a clean, energising kick. So, get all-day freshness and 48h protection from sweat and odour from morning to night with Sure Men Active Dry anti-perspirant deodorant spray. Wear what you like. Move when you want. You know you’re protected. This anti-perspirant for men is dermatologically tested & alcohol-free*. How to use: Firstly, shake the Sure Men Active Dry anti-perspirant deodorant can. Then hold it 15 centimetres away from your underarm and spray evenly in a well-ventilated area. Avoid contact with eyes and broken skin.

Name: Simple Biodegradable Cleansing Wipes 20'S
Description: Too tired for a lengthy skincare routine? Try Simple face wipes. Gentle on skin and tough on make-up, Simple Kind to Skin Cleansing Facial Wipes gently and effectively cleanse and lift away grease, impurities and make-up, even waterproof mascara. Our make-up wipes are convenient, quick-to-use and the perfect addition to any make-up bag, gym kit or bathroom. Our Simple wipes do not dry out, irritate skin or leave a greasy residue. They're great to use as a make-up remover or part of your daily morning or night cleansing routine. And what's more, your skin is left feeling clean, fresh and instantly hydrated. Simple face wipes are unscented and made from softer-than-silk fibres, gentle cleansers, triple purified water and skin-loving ingredients; such as pro-vitamin B5 and vitamin E. They contain no artificial perfumes or alcohol, and no harsh chemicals that can upset your skin—perfect for sensitive skin. Every wipe is as fresh as the first, thanks to our aqua-lock technology which helps prevent the face cleansing wipes from drying out, so every wipe stays fresh and effective to the very last one. Our wipes are hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested and approved to care for all sensitive skin types. We believe in continuously working to be kinder to the planet. That's why Simple face wipes are vegan and Simple is certified cruelty-free by PETA, meaning we don't test on animals anywhere in the world. For best results: Cleanse day and night by gently wiping Simple Kind to Skin Facial Cleansing Wipes over eyelids, face, neck and even lips to cleanse the skin. Mascara won't budge? Hold the wipe over stubborn areas for a few seconds before wiping. Stop your facial wipes drying out by remembering to reseal the pack. Keep your skin healthy and beautiful with the whole Kind to Skin series!

Name: Radox Feel Uplifted Shower Gel 250Ml
Description: Radox Feel Uplifted Shower Gel contains the heavenly scent of basil mixed with the citrusy tang of grapefruit to make you feel delightfully uplifted. Luxury gel with pink grapefruit and basil scent which leaves your skin feeling refreshed and cleansed. For best results in shower, squeeze out the refreshing shower gel and lather on body. Gel rinses off easily, leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean. Our natural shower gel for women is suitable for daily use. Avoid eye contact. If eye contact occurs, rinse well with warm water. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use. At Radox, we have been taking inspiration from nature’s incredible fragrances since 1908 to create refreshing shower gels for men and inspiring shower gels for women. We then capture their transformative effects with one goal in mind: to help people get in the mood they want to be in. Smell is not only one of the most important senses, but one of the most overlooked. Fragrance has the power to lift you when you’re down, to awaken you when you rise, to make us sleep, love, create and dream. It has the power to genuinely transform how you feel. In fact, there's hardly a mood that cannot be moved by fragrance. And there’s barely a person on earth who can’t be affected by the right scent. Shower gels with 100% nature inspired fragrance to transform your mood.

Description: Don’t let dry hair get you down! At Tresemme, we understand the frustration of dry hair that's been damaged by styling appliances and other external factors. That's why we have developed Tresemme Moisture Rich Shampoo as part of our moisture-balanced system. Combining professional-quality performance with gentle care, our luxurious shampoo system for damaged hair has been formulated with vitamin E to instantly lock in moisture. Light enough for daily use, this moisture-balanced system* makes your hair shiny, soft and healthy-looking. Start your routine by gently cleansing your hair with Moisture Rich Shampoo. Then, squeeze a generous amount of Tresemme Moisture Rich hair conditioner into the palms of your hands and rub together. Make sure to apply the conditioner to damp hair, focusing on ends to mid-lengths first, and then work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots. Leave on for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Style with your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed. Tresemme delivers professional-quality and trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want, every day. We’re committed to equipping women to look, speak, and act with presence by providing professional-grade products, know-how and tools #poweryourpresence. Like our tips and haircare products? Leave a review on our website and eCommerce platform. *Tresemme Moisture Rich Shampoo and Conditioner

Name: Simple Kind To Skin Moisturising Handwash 250Ml
Description: Smile, it's Simple. Simple have been the experts in sensitive skin care since launching the first perfume and colour-free soap in 1960. We’ve stayed committed to our original philosophy of creating skincare and skin-cleansing products suitable for all skin types. From this, we have learnt that if something is as delicate and precious as skin, it deserves only the kindest care. Simple says “no” to artificial perfumes, colours and harsh chemicals that can upset your skin. So,  instead of using a regular hand soap, choose our Kind To Skin Moisturising Handwash, enriched with natural chamomile oil and skin-loving pro-vitamin B5. Dermatologically tested and suitable for even sensitive skin, this Simple handwash cleans and cares for your hands with its moisturising properties. At Simple, we believe that real kindness means caring about our non-human friends as much as we do about our skin. That's why our Simple handwash liquid does not contain any animal-derived ingredients, it is vegan and certified Cruelty-Free by PETA. We do not test on animals anywhere in the world. What's more, we use recycled plastic in our packaging, doing our part to responsibly reduce our footprint as much as possible. How to use: Apply to wet hands, lather and rinse thoroughly. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of eye contact, rinse immediately with plenty of water.

With Sure, you're always protected for whatever happens. It also contains Sure’s innovative MotionSense technology. It works like this: unique microcapsules sit on the surface of your skin. When you move, friction breaks those microcapsules, and they release more fragrance. Every time you move, MotionSense keeps you fresh and free from odour. Whether you’re working hard in the office, playing hard out and about or just meeting up with friends, Sure Men Quantum Dry will give you all the back-up you need. Sure. It won't let you down. This anti-perspirant deodorant spray has an invigorating and energising scent that combines fresh citrus, spices and wood tones. So, get all-day freshness and 48h protection from sweat and odour from morning to night with Sure Men Quantum Dry anti-perspirant deodorant spray. Wear what you like. Move when you want. You know you’re protected. This anti-perspirant for men is dermatologically tested & alcohol-free*. How to use: Firstly, shake the Sure Men Quantum Dry anti-perspirant deodorant can. Then hold it 15 centimetres away from your underarm and spray evenly in a well-ventilated area. Avoid contact with eyes and broken skin.

But what if you didn’t have to choose between volume and moisture for your fine, flat hair? Daily use, it’s so gentle, you can use this every day. How to use: Once you’ve soaked your hair with water, massage your shampoo into your scalp. Rinse well. You can repeat this step if you want, but for daily shampooing the rinse and repeat rule isn’t really necessary (unless you’ve been hitting the hairspray hard, that is).

Name: Radox Feel Energised Shower Gel 250Ml
Description: Radox Feel Energised Shower Gel has a 100% nature inspired fragrance. Harness the vibrancy of lime and cool mint and feel the city come alive. Summer and excited people spill into sunny streets. The weekend beckons. Feel the buzz. There’s something in the air. A refreshing shower gel with a Keylime and Peppermint fragrance combination, specially designed to unleash a mood, whether you want to be energised or refreshed, uplifted or soothed. For best results in the shower, squeeze out the refreshing shower gel, lather on body. Then rinse off easily leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean. Our foaming shower gel is suitable for daily use. If eye contact occurs, rinse well with warm water. In case of rash or irritation, discontinue use. At Radox, we have been taking inspiration from nature’s incredible fragrances since 1908 to create refreshing shower gels. We then capture their transformative effects with one goal in mind: to help people get in the mood they want to be in. Smell is not only one of the most important senses, but one of the most overlooked. Fragrance has the power to lift you when you’re down, to awaken you when you rise, to make us sleep, love, create, dream. It has the power to genuinely transform how you feel. In fact, there's hardly a mood that cannot be moved by fragrance. And there’s barely a person on earth who can’t be affected by the right scent. Shower gels with nature inspired fragrance to transform your mood. Explore the Radox range of nature inspired products, including a 2 in 1 men's shower gel, lavender shower gel, a pink grapefruit & basil shower gel for women, and more.

Specially formulated for even the most sensitive skin, our facial wash contains no artificial perfume or colour, no alcohol, and no harsh chemicals that can upset your skin. Enriched with vitamin B5, which is known to actively restore, soften, and smooth skin; this skin cleanser is also perfect for dry skin. Our Simple wash formula doesn’t clog pores, is hypoallergenic and it’s safe to use around your eyes. It’s 100% soap-free and, like all our Simple face products, this face wash is dermatologically tested. We believe in continuously working to be kinder to the planet. Alberto Balsam has been providing excellent affordable family shampoo & conditioner to UK families for generations. Over the years, we've learnt to celebrate all the small things that make life beautiful. That's why we use delicious natural ingredients, like raspberry, coconut, blueberry and apple in our products to give you little moments of joy with their lovely fragrances. With our value shampoo hair smells as good as it feels! Our extensive range of fresh ‘n’ fruity fragrances means that everyone in the family will be able to find their perfect Alberto Balsam shampoo scent, for a fantastically fragrant in wash experience and delicious smelling hair. We can't promise it will make getting out of bed easier, but it will give you the best shower you've ever had. The fresh fragrance of Lynx shower gel doesn't just deep clean your skin, it cleans your soul. It refreshes your mind, so you start your day right. Lather up with frozen lemon and iced mint, and let its menthol magic transform you into your most chill self. But what if you're a busy person that doesn't have time in the mornings? Don't worry, we got you. Lynx body wash isn't just a body wash. It's also a face wash. A body and face wash... that you can also use on your hair. That's right: 3 in 1 baby! A dermatologically tested triple-threat that helps you smell fresh for up to 8 hours. Possibly the best body wash for men the world has ever known. It puts the care back into men's skin care. Description: Don’t let dry hair get you down! At Tresemme, we understand the frustration of dry hair that's been damaged by styling appliances and other external factors. That's why we have developed Tresemme Moisture Rich Conditioner as part of our moisture-balanced range. Combining professional-quality performance with gentle care, our luxurious conditioner for damaged hair has been formulated to instantly lock in moisture where your hair needs it most. Light enough for daily use, this moisture-balanced system*, enriched with vitamin E, brings out your hair’s natural beauty. Start your routine by gently cleansing your hair with Moisture Rich Shampoo. Then, squeeze a generous amount of Tresemme Moisture Rich hair conditioner into the palms of your hands and rub together. Make sure to apply the conditioner to damp hair, focusing on ends to mid-lengths first, and then work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots. Leave on for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Style with your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed. Tresemme delivers professional-quality and trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want, every day. We’re committed to equipping women to look, speak, and act with presence by providing professional-grade products, know-how, and tools #poweryourpresence. Like our tips and haircare products? Leave a review on our website and eCommerce platform. *Tresemme Moisture Rich Shampoo and Conditioner

A few quick sprays are all you need for a long lasting, great smelling fragrance that makes a lasting impression. Stay fresh all day with Lynx Body Sprays. How to use it. Shake the can well and hold it 15cm away from your chest and body, spray in a well-ventilated area for great protection from style threatening odour. Whatever the occasion, it lasts all day long. Avoid contact with your eyes and broken skin. Stop use if rash or irritation occurs. Want more? Now available as a 48 hour Anti-Perspirant, this classic men’s fragrance is designed to keep you cool and dry no matter where the heat's coming from. Boost your sweat protection with Lynx Black Anti-perspirant 250ml and try it alongside our Lynx Black Body Wash 250ml. Why not also try Lynx Daily Fragrance, a sophisticated scent and every day fragrance for men. Use daily by spraying on neck and wrists. Refresh your style with Lynx Signature, Urban & Ice Chill Daily Fragrance 100ml. Find out more at lynxformen.com/uk.

Name: Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body Face Wash 400Ml
Description: For healthy-looking skin, you need great cleansing products that hydrate as well as clean. Developed specifically for men’s skin, Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face Wash 400 ml features our unique MicroMoisture technology to provide hydration for healthier, stronger skin. This moisturising body wash for men helps to protect your skin against dryness and irritation, while delivering a refreshing clean and total skin comfort. Enriched with menthol, the shower gel delivers cooling refreshment and washes away quickly without leaving residue behind. It's dermatologically tested and suitable for everyday use. How to use: In the shower, soak your body and face and use enough Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face Wash to cover half your palm. Rub your hands together to turn the gel into a light foam lather, working it into your body and face. Rinse thoroughly. Whether you want a body wash to help keep your skin hydrated or you’re looking for a deodorant to keep you feeling fresh and dry all day, the Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh range is designed to protect and care for your skin. Why not try this body cleanser alongside our Dove Men+Care Anti-perspirant Deodorant for lasting comfort and freshness? It comes in an aerosol can, stick, or roll-on, making it perfect for your gym bag or luggage for when you are on the go.

For best results, simply squeeze onto a shower puff or your hands and massage all over your body before rinsing thoroughly. Its gentle formula is free from artificial perfume, colour, or harsh chemicals that can upset your skin. Simple's natural shower gel for dry skin includes the perfect blend of ingredients to awaken and revitalise your skin. How to use: Squeeze onto a sponge or your hands. Gently massage over your skin to form a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly. Avoid contact with eyes. Smile, it's Simple. Simple has been the expert in sensitive skin since launching the first perfume and colour-free soap in 1960. We’ve stayed committed to our original philosophy of creating skin care and skin cleansing products suitable for all skin types. From this, we have learnt that if something is as delicate and precious as skin, it deserves only the kindest care. Simple says no to artificial perfumes and colours and no to harsh chemicals that can upset your skin. Instead, we use only the purest possible, skin-loving ingredients, so you can trust all our products to be kind to sensitive skin.

The first bodyspray to be launched as a stand-alone brand, Lynx originally came in three fragrances: Amber, Musk, and Spice. Since then, the Lynx Institute of Attractiveness has created not only dozens of great fragrances, but also shower gels, hairstyling and shampoo products. Whatever you decide, remember that we are on your side. Your goals are our goals. How to use it? Name: Lynx Africa Antiperspirant Deodorant Spray 250Ml
Description: Lynx Africa Antiperspirant Deodorant Spray for Men complements your style and helps you stay fresh and in control.Formulated to protect against excessive sweating for 48h, our deodorant helps you to stay fresh, confident, and ready for anything that comes your way. Not only effective at keeping you dry, this antiperspirant spray also has a unique, masculine fragrance. An exotic mix of African-inspired scents that stays with you for up to 48 hours, so you can be confident no matter the circumstances. Do what you want while we make sure you feel fresh and reinvigorated. Lynx was introduced to the UK in 1985. The first bodyspray to be launched as a stand-alone brand, Lynx originally came in three fragrances: Amber, Musk, and Spice. Since then, the Lynx Institute of Attractiveness has created not only dozens of great fragrances, but also shower gels and hair-styling and shampoo products. We aim to give you the edge in the mating game. This product has been dermatologically tested and has neutral pH, so that nothing can stop you or even slow you down in your everyday adventure. How to use it? Shaking the can well and holding it 15cm away from your underarm, spray in a well-ventilated area for great protection from style-threatening odour. Avoid contact with eyes and broken skin.

Name: Simple Kind To Skin Refresh Facial Wash Gel 150Ml
Description: Simple Refreshing Facial Wash Gel thoroughly washes away make-up, dirt and other impurities leaving your skin feeling clean, fresh and revived. Made with skin-loving ingredients, our Simple Facial Wash Gel contains triple-purified water and skin-loving pro-vitamin B5 and vitamin E to help replenish and nourish your skin without irritation. Perfect for even sensitive skin. Our Simple Refreshing Facial Wash Gel contains no colour or dye, no soap and no artificial perfume. Our gel face wash is hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic: perfect for cleansing even sensitive skin. Dermatologically tested and approved. Ophthalmologically tested. We believe in continuously working to be kinder to the planet. That's why our Kind to Skin Refreshing Facial Wash Gel is vegan and Simple is certified cruelty-free by PETA, meaning we don't test on animals, anywhere in the world. Want to know how to get the most out of your face wash? Use it in the morning and at night as part of your skincare routine, and don’t forget to pay special attention to your hairline and the sides of your nose as that’s where dirt and make-up can build up. It’s always best to apply a toner and moisturiser after cleansing with a Simple face cleanser. For best results: Wet your face with warm water, squeeze a small amount into hands and massage gently in a circular motion onto wet skin. Rinse with warm water and pat dry.

Name: Simple Kind To Skin Soothing Facial Toner 200Ml
Description: A great skincare routine is as easy as 1,2,3—with the middle step being a facial toner, of course! Our Simple Kind to Skin Soothing face toner features a special blend of Simple skin-toning goodness to help keep sensitive skin refreshed and toned. This blend includes ingredients like pro-vitamin B5, Chamomile, Witch Hazel and Allantoin. As a facial toner for sensitive skin, this is ideal for using after your cleanser and before you moisturise. Use it morning and night to help remove any last traces of dirt and make-up from your skin. Just pop a generous amount onto a cotton pad and gently wipe over your skin, using upward movements. This is our best face toner for sensitive skin, containing no artificial perfumes or colours, and no harsh chemicals that can upset your skin. We believe in continuously working to be kinder to the planet. That's why this Simple toner is vegan and Simple is certified cruelty-free by PETA, meaning we don't test on animals, anywhere in the world. Our toner is also made with 100% post-consumer recycled (PCR) plastic bottles that are 100% recyclable with their lids. Our soothing toner does not clog pores and is both hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested and approved. Give your skin a zing with some 0% alcohol, 100% soothing goodness! Spruce up your skincare regime, whether you're looking to create that naturally healthy-looking base for your make-up in the morning or to achieve cleansed-looking, nourished skin before bed. Keep your skin healthy and beautiful with the whole Kind to Skin range.

This anti-perspirant deodorant dries instantly - perfect for when you’re in a rush. With up to 48 hours of anti-perspirant protection, its dermatologically tested, alcohol-free formula contains our unique ¼  moisturising cream which helps delicate underarm skin to recover from the irritation that regular shaving can cause. The convenient 50 ml size is handbag/hand luggage-friendly and perfect to keep you feeling fresh while on the go. This roll-on deodorant for women provides the reliable underarm care you know and love, helping your underarms look and feel softer, smoother and even more beautiful than before. To get the best results from your Dove Invisible Dry Roll-On, apply it to clean, dry skin. Simply move the rollerball in a circular motion over each underarm to ensure you've covered the area completely. Enjoy underarm skin that feels beautiful and smells great thanks to Dove Invisible Dry Anti-perspirant Deodorant Roll-On. Pair it with your most colourful clothes and forget about those deodorant stains for good.

Description: If you’re after a long-lasting deodorant for men that works as long and hard as you, try Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Anti-perspirant Deodorant Aerosol 150 ml. Formulated with ¼ moisturiser technology, Dove men's deodorant is specifically designed to give you odour protection without compromise. It protects your skin against irritation, wards off skin dryness and fights sweat and odour for up to 48 hours while leaving a clean, subtle scent to keep you feeling fresh and dry for longer. Its non-irritant, dermatologically tested formula is tough on sweat, not on skin. How to use: Shake the can to activate the ingredients. Hold it 15 cm away from your underarm and spray evenly in a well-ventilated area. Avoid contact with eyes and broken skin. Why not try it alongside our Dove Men+Care Body and Face Wash for lasting comfort and freshness? Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Anti-perspirant Deodorant also comes in a deodorant stick or roll-on, making it perfect for your gym bag or luggage for when you are on the go. With our best formula ever, Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Anti-perspirant Deodorant spray gives you strong anti-perspirant protection with a long-lasting, subtle scent to keep you feeling refreshed and dry all day long.

Name: Tresemme Colour Revitalise Shampoo 900Ml
Description: You’ve invested in your hair colour and now you want it to last. So, whether you’re a fan of the natural look or love a vibrant colour trend, it’s important to take care of your new shade by using products that are designed for colour protection. That’s why we have developed Tresemme Colour Revitalise Shampoo as part of our colour-protecting collection. Combining professional-quality performance with gentle care, our colour protect shampoo has been formulated with Micellar Technology to help replenish moisture and gently cleanse your hair. Our formula is enriched with UV filter and Nutri-Oil to help keep your coloured hair vibrant for up to 12 weeks*. Start your routine by gently cleansing your hair with Colour Revitalise Shampoo. Apply a generous amount to wet hair from roots to ends. Gently massage the scalp with your fingertips to work into a lather, then rinse thoroughly. For best results, finish with Colour Revitalise Conditioner, and style with your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed. Tresemme delivers professional-quality and trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want, every day. We’re committed to equipping women to look, speak and act with presence through professional-quality products, know-how and tools. Like our tips and haircare products? Leave a review on our website and eCommerce platform. *With Tresemme Colour Revitalise Shampoo and Conditioner vs. non-conditioning shampoo. Based on 3.3 washes per week.

Name: Tresemme Colour Revitalise Conditioner 900Ml
Description: Why use Tresemme Colour Revitalise Conditioner for colour-treated hair? Heating, styling and repeated washing can cause your hair's colour to fade and lose its vibrancy. Our Colour Revitalise shampoo & conditioner, infused with Rosemary and Nutri-Oil, helps to keep your colour luminous for up to 12 weeks (Tresemme Colour Revitalise vs non-conditioning shampoo, based on 3.5 washes per week). The advanced formula of our conditioner will replenish vital moisture leaving coloured hair with a salon-healthy look and silky finish. Colour stays gorgeous for longer while hair is softer and more manageable. Our expert's tips: start with our colour care shampoo. Follow with the Tresemme Colour Revitalise Conditioner. Apply it from mid lengths to ends. Run a wide-tooth comb or fingers from roots to tips to detangle and work into the hair. Leave on for 2-3 minutes. Rinse thoroughly and style with your favourite Tresemme products. Since 1948, Tresemme has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look & feel fabulous like they've just stepped out of a salon. Description: Scrabbling around a bit trying to remove your eye make-up? We've got you covered! Simple Kind to Skin Eye Make-Up remover effortlessly takes off eye make-up in one go, even waterproof mascara. This oil-free formulation of our gentle eye make-up remover soothes the delicate eye area with skin-loving ingredients that are also suitable for contact lenses wearers. The skin around your eyes is really delicate, which is why it needs some proper TLC. Our eye make-up remover is ideal for all skin types, even sensitive skin. This Simple product is made with the perfect blend of gentle cleansers and contains multi-vitamins like vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5. Our Simple eye make-up remover contains no artificial perfume, colour or alcohol and no harsh chemicals that can upset your skin. We believe in continuously working to be kinder to the planet. That's why Kind to Skin Eye Make-up Remover is vegan and Simple is certified cruelty-free by PETA, meaning we don't test on animals, anywhere in the world. Our eye make-up remover is also made with post-consumer recycled (PCR) plastic bottles that are 100% recyclable with their lids. Our eye make-up remover is both dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested. So whether you’re wearing make-up day or night, there's no harsh, stinging for your eyes, which makes for a great mascara remover. How to apply: Step 1: Apply Simple make-up remover to a cotton pad or eye pads. Step 2: Wipe gently around your eye without rubbing. Make sure to try our other eye care products such as our eye roll-on, eye cream, eye balm and make-up removing eye pads.

Name: Sure Women Cotton Stick Antiperspirant Deodorant 40Ml
Description: Every second counts, whether you’re running late or running to beat your personal best. Nothing should distract you from your focus – especially not sweat. Sure Women Cotton Dry Anti-perspirant Deodorant Stick 40 ml is formulated to provide 48h protection against sweat and odour, so you can feel fresh, dry and protected all day long, and always prepared for whatever happens. This deodorant stick also contains Sure’s innovative MotionSense technology. It works like this: unique microcapsules sit on the surface of your skin. When you move, friction breaks those microcapsules, and they release more fragrance. Every time you move, MotionSense keeps you fresh and free from odour. Whether you’re working hard in the office, playing hard out and about or just meeting up with friends, Sure Women Cotton Dry anti-perspirant will give you all the back-up you need, whenever you need it. Sure, it won't let you down. Keep sweat and odour at bay with the 48h protection provided by Sure Women Cotton Dry anti-perspirant deodorant stick – the more you move, the more it works. How to use: Apply women's deodorant onto dry underarms evenly to release a light, clean fragrance inspired by fresh cotton sheets. Avoid contact with eyes and broken skin.

Instead, it contains the perfect-blend of skin-loving ingredients that are gentle and kind to skin, making it perfect for all skin types, even sensitive skin. Place the mask evenly over your previously cleansed skin. Leave for 15 minutes and gently peel off the mask. Massage the excess of product into your skin or use a cotton pad to remove, depending on how hydrated you want your skin to be! No need to rinse. No artificial perfume or colour. The soluble tablets contain aspirin and paracetamol, which together have pain relief, fever relief, and anti-inflammatory properties. Aspirin and paracetamol are rapidly absorbed and distributed around the body to provide fast relief of general pain such as headaches, migraines, period pain, toothache, and sore throat. Alka-Seltzer XS also provides symptomatic relief of fever, colds and flu, as well as rheumatic pain, sciatica, lumbago, fibrositis, and muscular aches and pains. Name: Sure Women Maximum Protection Confidence Cream Antiperspirant Deodorant 45Ml
Description: Sure Women Maximum Protection Confidence Anti-perspirant Deodorant Cream Stick 45 ml is our most powerful protection against sweat and odour in an easy to apply, dermatologically tested cream stick format to keep you feeling fresh, dry and confident. When you are dealing with excessive sweating, working with your body is the way to go. Our TRIsolid cream formula is body responsive with a unique blend of skin-moisturising ingredients, so it’s gentle enough for everyday use. Sure’s most powerful protection forms a protective layer across your sweat glands and our odour-fighting technology means total confidence: it tackles odour from the source leaving a clean, fresh and white fragrance. It’s no wonder 9/10 women trust Sure Maximum Protection*. How to use: Sure Maximum Protection Anti-perspirant Deodorant for women can be used in the morning or at night. For optimum sweat protection, apply at night when your sweat glands are less active. Twist the bottom of your powerful women’s anti-perspirant deodorant to release the cream with two clicks per underarm and smooth onto each underarm evenly. Description: Whether you want to fully secure your look, or to help take control of your frizz for 24 hours, Tresemme has a range of hairsprays to meet the level of hold you need. For a lighter all-day touchable hold, try a level 3 hairspray, as it allows your locks to move naturally whilst giving you the control and grip you need to help tame frizz and flyaways. To freeze your look in a flash, why not try a Tresemme hard hold hairspray with level 5 hold – your updos will not fall flat with this product. All Tresemme hairsprays are non-sticky to the touch and brush out easily. To apply the hairspray, spray from 20-30 cm away from your dry hair, one section at a time. For a stronger hold, layer more coats just where you want more control. For maximum fullness, flip your hair upside down and mist all over to set. Description: TRESemme Cleanse & Replenish Deep Cleansing Shampoo is the answer for hair that need  refreshing. Treat your locks to a clean slate with vitamin-enriched TRESemme Cleanse & Replenish collection, the perfect gentle cleanse for that just-left-the-salon feeling. Why use deep cleansing shampoo? The professional quality formula of TRESemme Deep Cleansing shampoo, infused with multi-vitamins, gently cleanses away build-up and impurities that can weigh the hair down and diminish its natural shine. Gentle enough for daily use, so you can reveal fresh, clean, purified hair every day. For all hair types, to get the look you want. Gently apply Deep Cleansing TRESemme Shampoo to wet hair starting from roots to ends. Work into a lather and gently massage the scalp. Then rinse thoroughly. Follow with TRESemme Remoisturise Hair Conditioner. Finally, style with your favourite TRESemme products. From our origins in Salons in 1948, TRESemme has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look and feel fabulous, like they've just stepped out of the salon. TRESemme is dedicated to creating hair care  products that are salon quality. Inspired by stylists and tested in salons, the products are designed  to help you achieve gorgeous hair every day. For more secrets from our professional stylists and details on TRESemme styling appliances & tools, visit tresemme.co.uk. Avoid contact with eyes. Can cause eye irritation. In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.

Name: Alberto Balsam Blueberry Shampoo 350Ml
Description: Alberto Balsam Shampoo Anti-Oxidant Blueberry. Perfect for when your hair needs a bit of extra nourishment, this Anti-Oxidant Blueberry shampoo gently cleanses to energise and replenish moisture, leaving your hair looking and feeling fabulous! It uses most of the same ingredients you'll find in higher priced brands, but at a great price which means you can afford to look glamorous every day! How to use: Apply on wet hair, lather then rinse thoroughly. Avoid contact with eyes, in case of contact rinse with water. Have you also tried our Alberto Balsam Anti-Oxidant Blueberry shampoo? Alberto Balsam has been providing excellent affordable family shampoo & conditioner to UK families for generations. Over the years, we've learnt to celebrate all the small things that make life beautiful. That's why we use delicious natural ingredients, like raspberry, coconut, blueberry and apple in our products to give you little moments of joy with their lovely fragrances. Hair smells as good as it feels! Our extensive range of fresh ‘n’ fruity fragrances means that everyone in the family will be able to find their perfect Alberto Balsam shampoo scent, for a fantastically fragrant in wash experience and delicious smelling hair. The perfect family shampoo and conditioner!

Name: Fixodent Plus Bestfood Seal Adhesive 40G
Description: Avoid irritating particles and enjoy the secure hold all day long with Fixodent Plus Best Food Seal premium denture adhesive. Developed to provide you with the best food seal technology within the Fixodent line-up, it is a perfect solution if you think there is nothing more irritating than getting food particles stuck underneath the dentures. Fixodent Plus Best Food Seal creates up to 5x better food seal thanks to a 75% thinner nozzle vs. Fixodent Complete variants, which allows you to apply the adhesive in a precise continuous line, instead of singular dots. It also provides strong hold, so your dentures stay secure at every moment and while eating every kind of food, and thanks to cushioning effect between gums and dentures, you will experience even more comfort throughout the day-long wear. Fixodent Plus Best Food Seal is also flavour-free and does not affect the taste of foods.

Name: Simple Kind To Eyes Eye Make-Up Remover Pads 30S
Description: Our Simple Kind to Skin Eye Make-Up Remover Pads effectively cleanse your eyes of make-up (including waterproof mascara) and impurities whilst instantly hydrating the skin around your eyes, making them the perfect face wipes for dehydrated, dry, or sensitive skin. Cleansing plays an important part in a healthy skincare regime. However, some eye make-up removers are harsh and can strip away natural oils, making the skin around your eyes feel tight, dry and dehydrated. This is why you should choose a cleanser for sensitive skin. Our eye pads are infused with skin-essential minerals and a plant extract and do not contain any artificial colours or perfume, or any harsh chemicals that can upset your skin. These eye pads are part of the Simple Kind to Skin range and are specifically designed to leave skin healthy and happy. Why not try out our other products in the Simple Kind to Skin range to help keep your skin hydrated? After using Simple Kind to Skin Eye Pads, we recommend cleansing your face with Simple Kind to Skin Micellar Cleansing Water. Finish your routine by smoothing Simple Hydrating Gel Cream into your face and neck to instantly moisturise your skin and complete your hydration skincare routine. Make sure to also try our Kind to Skin Eye Roll On, Dark Circle Cream, Under Eye Cream, Dual Effect Eye Make-Up Remover, and Eye Balm!
Ingredients: Aqua, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Glycerin, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Ceteareth-20, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Citrate, Ceteareth-12, Benzoic Acid, Citric Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Pantolactone, Tocopheryl Acetate

Description: Nothing quite beats a nice cold shower in the morning to really get us going and help us feel clean and hygienic, does it? If only we could bottle that feeling and keep it with us all day long, right? Well now you can, with Dove Go Fresh Cucumber & Green Tea Anti-perspirant Deodorant Roll-On. Give your morning a burst of cucumber freshness with a soothing hint of green tea with our Dove Go Fresh Anti-perspirant Deodorant Roll-On. The convenient 50 ml size is handbag/hand luggage-friendly and perfect to keep you feeling fresh while on the go. With up to 48 hours of anti-perspirant protection, you can carry the clean, crisp fragrances of cucumber and green tea with you all through the day. Its dermatologically tested, alcohol-free formula contains our unique ¼ moisturising cream which helps delicate underarm skin to recover from the irritation that regular shaving can cause. This roll-on deodorant for women provides the reliable underarm care you know and love, helping your underarms look and feel softer, smoother and even more beautiful than before. For all-day freshness, simply move the rollerball in a circular motion over each underarm to ensure you've covered the area completely. Enjoy underarm skin that feels beautiful and smells great thanks to Dove Go Fresh Cucumber & Green Tea Anti-perspirant Deodorant Roll-On.

Description: Sure Women Maximum Protection Clean Scent Anti-Perspirant Deodorant Cream Stick 45 ml is our most powerful protection against sweat and odour in an easy to apply, dermatologically tested cream-stick format to keep you feeling fresh, dry and confident. When you are dealing with excessive sweating, working with your body is the way to go. Our TRIsolid cream formula is body responsive with a unique blend of skin-moisturising ingredients, so it’s gentle enough for everyday use. Sure’s most powerful protection forms a protective layer across your sweat glands and our odour-fighting technology means total confidence: it tackles odour from the source leaving a clean, fresh and white fragrance. It’s no wonder 9/10 women trust Sure Maximum Protection*. How to use: Sure Maximum Protection Anti-perspirant Deodorant for women can be used in the morning or at night. For optimum sweat protection, apply at night when your sweat glands are less active. Twist the bottom of your powerful women’s anti-perspirant deodorant to release the cream with two clicks per underarm and smooth onto each underarm evenly. Whether you’re working hard in the office, playing hard out and about or just meeting up with friends, Sure Women Maximum Protection Anti-perspirant will give you all the back-up you need. Sure, it won't let you down.*Based on a survey of 208 UK women who tested the product

Description: If you’re looking for a spray deodorant that combines long-lasting freshness, amazing fragrance and instant cooling effect, you’ve just found your match! It’s called Lynx Limited Edition Anthony Joshua Ice Chill Deodorant & Body Spray. This deodorant will keep you feeling fresh and confident for up to 48 hours. All thanks to Iced Mint and Lemon fragrance, the freshest combination you can imagine. Plus, it features a bold, limited edition design created with Anthony Joshua, the world heavyweight boxer. So we know that sometimes you need a blast of instant freshness to get yourself going. To give you that bit of confidence. You could be going on a date, popping into town or just heading to work. Now all you need to do is just twist the cap, shake the can and spray yourself chill with Lynx Ice Chill Deodorant & Body Spray all over your body. No kidding – you will instantly feel your body temperature drop by 6 degrees! And that Iced Mint and Lemon fragrance will stay with you to guarantee super freshness all day (or night) long. Name: Tresemme Moisture Rich Luxurious Shampoo 500Ml
Description: Don’t let dry hair get you down! At Tresemme, we understand the frustration of dry hair that's been damaged by styling appliances and other external factors. That's why we have developed Tresemme Moisture Rich Shampoo as part of our moisture-balanced system. Combining professional-quality performance with gentle care, our luxurious shampoo system for damaged hair has been formulated with vitamin E to instantly lock in moisture. Light enough for daily use, this moisture-balanced system* makes your hair shiny, soft and healthy-looking. Start your routine by gently cleansing your hair with Moisture Rich Shampoo. Then, squeeze a generous amount of Tresemme Moisture Rich hair conditioner into the palms of your hands and rub together. Make sure to apply the conditioner to damp hair, focusing on ends to mid-lengths first, and then work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots. Leave on for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Style with your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed. Tresemme delivers professional-quality and trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want, every day. We’re committed to equipping women to look, speak, and act with presence by providing professional-grade products, know-how and tools #poweryourpresence. Like our tips and haircare products? Leave a review on our website and eCommerce platform. *Tresemme Moisture Rich Shampoo and Conditioner

Name: Lynx Gold Anti White Marks Antiperspirant Deodorant Spray 250Ml
Description: Lynx Gold Anti White Marks Anti-Perspirant Deodorant 250ml is part of the Lynx male grooming range. Lynx Gold gives you sweat protection without white marks or yellow stains, leaving your style protected. Scented with Oud Wood and Dark Vanilla, Lynx Gold Anti White Marks Anti-perspirant offers a subtle, woody fragrance that gives you a memorable touch. To get the most from your product, shake the can well and hold it 15cm away from your underarm. Spray in short bursts for great protection from style threatening odour to start your morning feeling fresh and confident. Black or white shirt – doesn’t matter, Lynx Gold leaves no white marks or yellow stains. To fully refine your style, get showered first with Lynx You Body Wash. Then sharpen up your look with Lynx Clean Cut Look Definition Wax and Lynx Signature Daily Fragrance with Oud Wood & Dark Vanilla. Also available as a body spray, this masculine fragrance is designed to keep you cool and dry. Boost your sweat protection with our Lynx Body Wash range. Why not also try Lynx Daily Fragrance, a sophisticated every day fragrance for men. Refresh your style with Lynx Signature, Urban & Ice Chill Daily Fragrance 100ml. Find Your Magic with the new Lynx male grooming range.

Name: Vaseline Lip Therapy 17G Gold Dust
Description: Vaseline Lip Therapy Gold Dust Lip Balm Tin is clinically proven to help heal dry lips. It has the luxurious addition of golden sparkles and a refreshing white pear & chamomile scent. The non-sticky formula of Vaseline lip balms are invitingly soft and melt into your lips. This SPF lip balm tin comes in iconic packaging that fits neatly into your pocket or purse, so you can rehydrate your lips on-the-go. Lip Therapy from Vaseline is a lip balm you can rely on and provides long-lasting relief from dryness. Just like with all Vaseline lip care products, this everyday essential for healthy-looking lips is made with 100% pure Vaseline Petroleum Jelly. Vaseline is the original wonder jelly that has been helping to heal dry skin since 1870, and now you can get all of its benefits in an SPF lip balm product exclusively designed for your lips. The top, protective layer of skin on your lips is thinner than on the rest of your body, so it needs a lip balm that provides long-lasting moisture. These formulas help support the natural recovery of your dry lips by locking in moisture. The elements can be hard on your lips, so it’s essential to keep them moisturized. The  Gold Dust Lip Balm Tin is great for safeguarding against dryness caused by the weather, so you can be confident that your lips are ready to face the elements. You can now also get your very own personalised lip balm tin, just visit https://personalised-tin.vaseline.co.uk/.
Ingredients: Germany

Your hair will get soft and free-flowing because Herbal Essences bio:renew formula continues to work with each wash. Plus, you'll notice your hair shining, smooth and free from frizz. From the first pop of the cap, Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo will take you on a multi-layered scent experience to the warm sands of Morocco. Immerse yourself in the scent of creamy vanilla followed by a burst of fizzy citrus and lingering exotic spices. Simply apply shampoo to wet hair, massage into a creamy lather, enjoy the scent, and rinse. Made with at least 90% natural origin ingredients*, pH Balanced and safe for colour treated hair. * Purified water and natural-source ingredient materials with limited processing.

The aspirin is rapidly absorbed and distributed around the body to act fast on general pain such as headaches, period pain, neuralgia, toothache, and sore throat. Alka-Seltzer Original also provides symptomatic relief of fever, colds and flu, as well as rheumatic pain, sciatica, lumbago, fibrositis, and muscular aches and pains. Alka-Seltzer Original can be taken by adults and children over 16. It is sugar free and suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Name: Tresemme Freeze Hold Hair Spray 400Ml
Description: Whether you want to fully secure your hairstyle or help take control of your frizzy hair for 24 hours, the Tresemme Freeze Hold Hairspray will help you achieve the end look you want. This Freeze Hold Hairspray is fast drying and brushes out easily meaning you can recreate your style as many times as you want, with an all-day hold. Tresemme have created a range of hairsprays to meet the level of hold you need. If you want to freeze your look, then the Tresemme Freeze Hold 5 is for you – your updos will not fall flat with this hairspray. For a lighter all-day touchable hold, try a level 3 hairspray, as it allows your locks to move naturally whilst giving you the control and grip you need to help tame frizz and flyaways. All Tresemme hairsprays are non-sticky to the touch and brush out easily. To apply Tresemme Freeze Hold Hairspray, spray from 20-30cm away from your dry hair, one section at a time. For a stronger hold, layer more coats just where you want more control. For maximum fullness, flip your hair upside down and mist all over to set. Tresemme delivers professional quality and trend inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want, every day. Like our tips and haircare products? Leave a review on our website or eCommerce platform.

It protects your skin against irritation and fights sweat and odour for up to 48 hours while leaving a clean, subtle scent to keep you feeling fresh and dry for longer. Its non-irritant, dermatologically tested formula is tough on sweat, not on skin. How to use: Swipe Dove Men+Care Anti-perspirant stick deodorant several times over skin to dispense an even layer onto each of your underarms. Do not use on broken skin. Stop use if rash or irritation occurs. Why not try it alongside our Dove Men+Care Body and Face Wash for lasting comfort and freshness? Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Anti-Perspirant Deodorant also comes in an aerosol can or roll-on, making it perfect for your gym bag or luggage for when you are on the go. With our best formula ever, Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort

Name: Tresemme Protect Heat Defence Styling Spray 300Ml
Description: Did you know that heat appliances can reach up to 230°C? Our Tresemme Care & Protect Heat Defence Spray is designed to help protect against damage from harsh temperatures so you can use your favourite style tools with confidence and helps restore shine to dry and damaged hair. The professional-quality formula contains a heat-activated complex to help protect hair when drying and straightening. Enriched with UV filter, this heat protectant spray helps prevent hair from becoming brittle and dull while reducing breakage by up to 82% with continued use**. Prep your hair with your favourite Tresemme Shampoo and Conditioner. Then, unlock the spray by pushing the button at the side of the pump. Spray evenly through damp hair for soft, shiny results. Use a brush to pull hair straight and blow-dry from roots to ends. For a really smooth finish, use a hairdryer with a concentrator nozzle. Finish your style with your favourite Tresemme hairspray. If you are looking for body and bounce, apart from heat protection spray, try our Volumising Blow-Dry Crème. Or if it's a super smooth shine you are after, give our Smooth & Shine Blow-Dry Mist a go. If you have thick hair and want help to control frizz, why not pick up our Frizz-Free Blow-Dry Crème? And if you just want to protect and care for your hair, try our Tresemme Heat Protect Spray. All products give protection up to 230°C, so you are covered from heat damage caused by straighteners and curlers too. Tresemme delivers professional-quality and trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you master the style you want, every day. Like our tips and hair care products? Leave a review on our website and eCommerce platform.
Ingredients: Aqua, Propylene glycol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Amodimethicone, Bisamino PEG/PPG-41/3 Aminoethyl PG-Propyl Dimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Potassium Dimethicone PEG-7 Panthenyl Phosphate, Oleth-20, Sodium Cocoyl Amino Acids, Trideceth-12, Triethanolamine, Disodium EDTA, Quaternium-26, Benzophenone-4, Butylene Glycol, Parfum, DMDM Hydantoin, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Sodium benzoate, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool

Name: Vo5 Mega Hold Styling Mousse 200Ml
Description: Keep your hair in place with VO5 Mega Hold Hair Mousse. This hair styling mousse offers all day 5/5 level hold for a hair style that lasts. Take control of your hair with a hair care product that gives your hair a volume boost and is effective for creating long-lasting styles of your own. Our hair mousse with UV filter offers 24-hour humidity protection to help fight frizz and protects your hair from damaging UV rays. How to use: Shake before use. Use on clean, towel dried hair. Keep can upright and press nozzle to dispense desired amount of mousse into palm of hand. Use your fingers to comb hair from roots to tips. Style Tip: For extra control, finish your style with VO5 Ultimate Hairspray. VO5 is here for your everyday styling wants and needs! As the UK’s #1 styling brand*, VO5 has a part to play to give you a better hair day, every day. If you like VO5 Mega Hold Hair Mousse, be sure to check out the other VO5 hair styling products in the full range like our Hair Fibre, Hair Paste or Hair Putty to remix your style and experiment with your hair even further! *Based on Nielsen ScanTrack (Total UK, excluding NI) data for Hair Styling, 12-months to 22nd April 2017 (Copyright 2017, The Nielsen Company).

Name: Tresemme Moisture Rich Luxurious Conditioner 500Ml
Description: Don’t let dry hair get you down! At Tresemme, we understand the frustration of dry hair that's been damaged by styling appliances and other external factors. That's why we have developed Tresemme Moisture Rich Conditioner as part of our moisture-balanced range. Combining professional-quality performance with gentle care, our luxurious conditioner for damaged hair has been formulated to instantly lock in moisture where your hair needs it most. Light enough for daily use, this moisture-balanced system*, enriched with vitamin E, brings out your hair’s natural beauty. Start your routine by gently cleansing your hair with Moisture Rich Shampoo. Then, squeeze a generous amount of Tresemme Moisture Rich hair conditioner into the palms of your hands and rub together. Make sure to apply the conditioner to damp hair, focusing on ends to mid-lengths first, and then work any remaining conditioner up towards the roots. Leave on for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Style with your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed. Tresemme delivers professional-quality and trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want, every day. We’re committed to equipping women to look, speak, and act with presence by providing professional-grade products, know-how, and tools #poweryourpresence. Like our tips and haircare products? Leave a review on our website and eCommerce platform. *Tresemme Moisture Rich Shampoo and Conditioner

Name: Tresemme Smooth Salon Silk Conditioner 900Ml
Description: Tresemme Salon Silk Conditioner for dry and frizz-prone hair delivers moisture where your hair needs it most, calming frizz and flyaways without weighing styles down. This advanced moisturising conditioner, enriched with Moroccan argan oil and silk proteins, nourishes and tames frizzy hair, leaving it smooth and salon-soft. Light enough for daily use, our Salon Silk system delivers intense moisturisation. For best results, start with the Tresemme Salon Silk Shampoo. Then, apply this anti-frizz hair conditioner from mid lengths to ends. Run a wide-tooth comb or fingers from roots to ends to detangle and work the conditioner into your hair. Leave for 2-3 minutes. Rinse thoroughly and style with your favourite Tresemme products to enjoy smooth, soft, healthy-looking hair. Since 1948, Tresemme has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look & feel fabulous, like she's just stepped out of a salon. We are dedicated to creating hair care products that will help you achieve gorgeous hair every single day. Here at Tresemme, we are committed to equipping women to make their presence count. That's why we have created The Presence MasterClass. It's a free 7-part MasterClass that's been designed to help you look, speak and act with a true sense of presence.

Name: Nivea Body Express Hydration Lotion 400Ml
Description: NIVEA Express Hydration Body Lotion provides your normal to dry skin with the moisture and care it needs and deserves. The formula with Sea Minerals supplies you with moisture – all day long. The patented NIVEA formula uses the knowledge that our skin contains sufficient moisture in its deeper layers. The unique composition of skin’s own moisturiser, moisture-locking lipids and care providing oils bind and hold water in the skin thus the moisture cannot evaporate easily into the surrounding area. The skin is well protected from drying out, because water loss is reduced and the moisture level of the skin is increased. The latest testing methods have shown that the perfect combination of high quality ingredients of our NIVEA body lotions together with the NIVEA Deep Moisture Serum penetrates deeply into the skin, locking moisture and providing deep moisture for 48h. The product comes in a practical pump bottle that makes application especially easy.

Herbal Essences bio:renew helps purify & protect against what your hair gets used to over time. The result? Soft, free-flowing hair. Your hair will get soft and free-flowing because Herbal Essences bio:renew formula continues to work with each wash. Plus, you'll notice your hair shining, smooth and free from frizz. From the first pop of the cap, Argan Oil of Morocco Hair Conditioner will take you on a multi-layered scent experience to the warm sands of Morocco. Immerse yourself in the scent of creamy vanilla followed by a burst of fizzy citrus and lingering exotic spices. Simply apply conditioner generously to wet hair from root to tip, enjoy the scent, and rinse. Description: Dove Visible Glow Nourishing Tanning Lotion contains subtle self-tanners to add a glow to your skin. The self-tanners gradual build enhancing your natural skin colour, achieve that summer glow all year round. The gradual build of the self-tan ensures you control the colour that develops and can continue to build upon your tan over time. Due to the naturally moisturizing format of Dove Visible Glow your tan will both build and fade evenly, minimizing the risk of streaks for a natural looking tan. Dove visible glow nourishes your skin whilst building your gradual self-tan to take care of your skin whilst also offering the added benefit of a gradual tan. Dove visible glow is lightly scented. For best results apply daily to clean dry skin immediately after showering to achieve the best moisturizing benefit. Ensure skin is completely dry before dressing to ensure that the tan has been fully absorbed. Dove Visible Glow helps build a natural subtle glow over time that helps you to look your summer best. Apply daily in a circular motion the gradual tanning lotion all over to subtly build an even streak-free tan. Make sure you wash hands after use. Enjoy visibly glowing skin all year round.

Name: Dove Go Fresh Pear & Aloe Vera Antiperspirant Deodorant 250Ml
Description: Looking for a scent to make you stand out from the crowd? If your idea of the best smelling deodorant is something a little different, you’ll love Dove Go Fresh Anti-perspirant Deodorant Aerosol. Its unique pear and aloe vera scent delivers a burst of unexpected freshness, while the long-lasting formula keeps you confidently dry and odour-free for up to 48 hours. Dove Go Fresh deodorant helps keep you feeling dry and comfortable, but it goes beyond that. Enriched with our unique ¼ moisturising cream, this Dove deodorant spray also nourishes and cares for your underarm skin. The alcohol-free formula helps your underarms recover from irritation caused by shaving, leaving them soft, smooth and beautiful. All the care you expect from Dove, and with a scent that’s bright and refreshing too! For best protection from sweat marks and skin irritation: After showering, make sure your underarms are dry and cool. Remember to give the can a good shake before using to make sure you combine all the ingredients together. For even coverage, hold the can roughly 15 cm away – that’s elbow length if you don’t have a ruler handy – and give each underarm a spray for a couple of seconds.

Name: Dove Maximum Protection Original Clean Cream Antiperspirant Deodorant 45Ml
Description: We’re most likely to sweat during challenging times when we want to feel our most confident. Perhaps it’s the day of a tough meeting that you’ve been burning the midnight oil to prepare for or one of those occasions where absolutely everything happens at the same time. Whatever the reason, the solution is the same: Dove Maximum Protection Original Clean Anti-perspirant Cream Stick is our most powerful protection against excessive sweating. This strong deodorant for women contains ¼ moisturising cream to help underarm skin recover from irritation caused by shaving for great underarm care. Add in the fact that it’s been dermatologically tested and has 0% alcohol, you can be sure that this Maximum Protection anti-perspirant will be kind to your skin while being tough on sweat. Now the only thing you have to worry about is to prioritise your time. Let Dove Maximum Protection Original Clean Anti-perspirant Cream Stick take care of perspiration while you turn on the charm and enjoy your day. How to use: Dove Maximum Protection Original Clean Anti-perspirant Cream Stick can be used in the morning or at night. For optimum sweat protection, apply at night when your sweat glands are less active. You will be protected for 48 hours, even after showering. Twist the bottom of your powerful anti-perspirant deodorant stick to release the cream with two clicks per underarm and smooth onto each underarm evenly.

Simple Micellar face wipes have combined the micellar water technology with our convenient wipes format. They’re gentler than soap-based cleansers so skin is not left feeling dry or tight, but clean, fresh and instantly hydrated. At Simple, we believe in being kind to skin, the planet and people, and that’s why we have created this Limited Edition range of Simple packs in partnership with Little Mix. In the UK, nearly 1 in 3 teens have experienced bullying online so together with Little Mix and our charity partner Ditch the Label, we are continuing to #ChooseKindness and make a stand.

Name: Olay Provital Anti-Wrinkle Night Cream 50Ml
Description: Olay Anti-Wrinkle’s targeted solution minimizes the appearance of wrinkles, so you can laugh in the face of wrinkles. Olay Anti-Wrinkle Pro Vital night cream is specifically designed to address the specific needs of mature skins and visibly reduce even deep wrinkles while you sleep. Research has shown that your skin starts to behave differently as it matures. Structural changes in the dermal matrix and reduction in collagen levels make the skin appear thinner and less bouncy. Targeted Vitamin Complex, a sophisticated multi-vitamin blend of anti-ageing hero ingredients niacinamide, vitamin e and pro-vitamin B5, helps to protect the skin while intense hydration helps restore firmness and elasticity. Mature skin appear to behave like younger skin. As a result skin is more resilient, feels more bouncy and replumped and even deep wrinkles appear reduced.

The system* with Micellar Technology will also gently and effectively cleanse your hair. For gorgeous hair volume, start your routine by cleansing your hair with Volume & Body Shampoo. Apply a generous amount to wet hair from roots to ends. Then, gently massage the scalp with your fingertips to work into a lather, and rinse thoroughly. Follow with Tresemme Volume &  Body Conditioner, specifically designed for fine, flat hair, to further help your hair from falling flat giving it all-day volume and body. To finish off your look, use your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed. Tresemme delivers professional-quality and trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want, every day. We’re committed to equipping women to look, speak and act with presence by providing professional-quality products, know-how and tools. Like our tips and hair care products? Name: Dove Nourishing Secret Antiperspirant Deodorant Coconut & Jasmine 250Ml
Description: Dove Nourishing Secrets is a range of products inspired by indulging and caring rituals practised by women around the world, combining the intense nourishment from Dove with nature inspired ingredients. The New Dove Nourishing Secrets Restoring Ritual Anti-perspirant deodorant infused with a warm and exotic floral fragrance of Coconut & Jasmine flower, transport your senses to India where these ingredients are an integral part of women’s beauty and restoring rituals. The tropical warmth of coconut, combined with the calming sweet scent of jasmine flower is a real treat for your senses. With up to 48 hours protection against sweat and odour, Dove Nourishing Secrets deodorant helps to keep you feeling dry and comfortable, but it goes beyond that. Enriched with our unique 1/4 moisturising cream, this Dove deodorant also nourishes and cares for your underarm skin. The alcohol free formula helps your underarms recover from irritation caused by shaving, leaving them soft, smooth and beautiful. For best protection from sweat marks and skin irritation: after showering, make sure your underarms are dry and cool. Remember to give your aerosol deodorant a good shake before using to evenly mix the protective and moisturising ingredients and get all the benefits. For even coverage, hold your arm above your head and spray one underarm at a time for a couple of seconds each, holding the can 15cm from your underarms.

Name: Vo5 Mega Hold Styling Gel 200Ml
Description: Vo5 Mega Hold Styling Gel for men offers 24hr extra strong control and is ideal to create your natural style of indestructible looks. Perfect for all cuts, the Vo5 men's hair gel was designed to give you total control over your hairstyle. The Mega Hold Hair Gel ensures 24-hour hold, so when you're done with your morning style you can get hair styling out of your hair for the rest of the day. With the hold level of 5/5, this Vo5 hair gel is a great ally in your daily battle with your hair. It will never let you down. Its formula is armed with additional Aquascreen which means that your style will last even in very high humidity. For best results: Use it on dry or damp hair. Work your hair section by section from roots to ends. Finally, mould into shape and leave to dry naturally. Need a style tip? For maximum lift, apply the product to damp hair and then blow dry. If you liked the Vo5 Mega Hold Styling Gel, be sure to check out the other Vo5 styling products in the full range like our Hair Gel Wax, Hair Paste, hair Clay or Hair Putty to remix your style and experiment with your hair even further! Don’t forget to leave a product review and share your best styling tips. Caution: Avoid any contact with eyes. If an eye contact occurs, rinse well with water immediately. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

Name: Vo5 Plump It Up Weightless Mousse 200Ml
Description: The VO5 Big Volume Mousse is a hair volumiser that provides great volume with a weightless, non-sticky feel. Our hair styling mousse thickens and plumps strands from root to tip, giving even the finest hair volume. Designed to provide long-lasting 3/5 hold, Big Volume hair styling mousse can make a better hair day every day. It also features heat defence and helps prevent against damage from straighteners, tongs or hairdryer styling. The VO5 hair volumiser is ideal to create either daytime or evening styles. Feel free to improvise! For best results: Shake the product well before use. Use the mousse on clean, towel dried hair. Keep the can upright, disperse the desired amount into the palm of your hand and apply evenly through hair from root to tip. Need a style tip? Here we go: For extra body and hold, finish your style with the VO5 High Volume Hairspray. If you liked the VO5 Big Volume Mousse, be sure to check out the other VO5 styling products in the full range to remix your style and experiment with your hair even further! Don’t forget to leave a product review and share your very best hair styling tips. Beat Hair Boredom with VO5. For more style and music inspiration, follow VO5 on social. Hair Play Every Day.

Name: Vo5 Extreme Style Rework Putty 150Ml
Description: Vo5 Rework Hair Putty offers all day reworkable hold and is ideal for creating natural styles with messy texture. Our Rework Putty is: Great for short to mid length cuts. Ideal to manipulate your hair in any direction. Easy to work in and wash out, with no stickiness, greasiness or flaking. Hold Level: 4/5. Rework Putty is a versatile product and is ideal to create either daytime or evening styles. How to use: Rub a small amount between your hands and work through hair from the roots. Sculpt and shape with fingers for a more defined look. Style tip: Use sparingly, a little goes a long way. Add more if needed. If you liked Vo5 Rework Putty, be sure to check out the other Vo5 styling products in the full range like our Hair Fibre, Hair Paste or Hair Gel Wax to remix your style and experiment with your hair even further! Don’t forget to leave a product review and share your best styling tips. For more style and music inspiration, follow Vo5 on social media and on our website at https://www.vo5.co.uk/. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, rinse well with water immediately. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

Description: Badedas is a unique range of premium bath and shower products containing horse chestnut, that enriches Badedas with its distinctive fragrance. Badedas products are created with natural plant extracts for a truly luxurious bathing experience. The Badedas range consists of three products including shower and bath products one being Indulgent Bath Gelee 750ml, the second being Original Bath Gelee 300ml and the third being Revitalising 3 in 1 Shower gel 200ml. Choose to use one of our Badedas range and use our indulgent bath products and experience the intensity of Badedas Indulgent Bath Gelee. A rich bath gel with a concentrated formulation, with the distinctive Badedas fragrance and natural moisturisers to leave your skin feeling soft, delicately fragranced and leaves you feeling completely indulged. When using our Badedas Bath product for best results pour the bath gel under warm running water and step in then surround yourself with an abundance of bubbles. Slide down into the fragrant waters that is enriched with natural plant extracts including extract of horse chestnut. Step out of your world and immerse yourself with Badedas. When using Badedas bath gel avoid contact with the eyes and if this happens, rinse well with clean, cool water. For adult use only.

All TRESemmé hairsprays are non-sticky to the touch and brush out easily.

Name: Tresemme 24 Hour Body Conditioner 900Ml
Description: Tresemme Volume & Body Hair Conditioner is a complete system of hair care especially designed to help your hair look and feel thicker and healthier. It adds fullness and body without weighing hair down, for thicker-looking hair with a natural-feeling bounce. To pump up the volume at the roots, give yourself the hair care you deserve with this body-building hair volumiser for sky-high height. How to use Tresemme Volume & Body Hair Conditioner? After shampooing with Tresemme Volume & Body Hair Shampoo, follow with this hair conditioner to intensely nourish each strand. Evenly distribute the conditioner on damp hair, focusing on mid-length to tips. Leave in for 2-3 minutes then rinse. Guided by our original philosophy from our salons in 1948, TRESemmé has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look & feel fabulous, like they've just stepped out of the salon. TRESemmé is dedicated to creating hair care products that are salon quality. Inspired by stylists and tested in salons, the products are designed to help you achieve salon gorgeous hair every day. If you think Tresemme Volume & Body Hair Conditioner is one of the best hair Volume Conditioners to achieve voluminous hair, don’t keep it a secret. Leave a review and share your tips on our website www.tresemme.com/uk.

Name: Lynx Signature Daily Fragrance 100Ml
Description: Lynx Signature Daily Fragrance Oud Wood & Vanilla is a precision pump fragrance spray for men. With a refined, woody fragrance, it adds a memorable final touch to your style, giving you a real presence. It's unpressurised, with no gas, giving you a fine fragranced mist that sprays precisely on your neck, wrists and garments, letting you smell damn fine, whenever. For a smooth scent that never overpowers. How to use: A few sprays are all you need for a great smelling fragrance that makes a lasting impression. Spray it on your pulse points – the heat generated by your pulse intensifies the fragrance and amplifies its projection. Whatever the occasion, this fragrance for men lasts all day long. It's also available in Adrenaline and Urban fragrances, so you can mix up your style any day of the week. Stay smelling fresh and confident with Lynx Daily Fragrances. Avoid contact with your eyes and broken skin. Stop use if rash or irritation occurs. Want more? Use with one of our anti-perspirants. They have been designed to keep you cool and dry no matter where the heat's coming from. Boost your sweat protection with Lynx Gold Anti-Perspirant Deodorant Spray 150 ml and Lynx Gold Bodywash 250 ml.

Name: Vo5 Styling Wax 75Ml
Description: Vo5 Styling Wax is a man's hair wax perfect for neat cuts requiring long-lasting controlled hold. It is ideal for short to mid length neat cuts to create your own natural style. Our Styling Wax shapes and moulds, allowing you to restyle and reform using fingers, brush or comb. The hold level of 4/5 gives a lasting firm hold without the crunchy feel of gel, but it also washes out easily. The Vo5 Styling Wax is a versatile product, ideal to create either daytime or evening styles. How To Use: Apply the wax on damp or dry hair. Work a small amount of product between the fingertips or palms. Spread through hair. Style Tip: Use sparingly, as a little of the wax goes a long way. Add more if needed. If you liked Vo5 Styling Wax, be sure to check out the other Vo5 styling products in the full range like our Hair Fibre, Hair Paste or Hair Putty to remix your style and experiment with your hair even further! Don’t forget to leave a product review and share your very best hair styling tips and tricks. Follow Vo5 on social and on our website. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, rinse well with water immediately. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

Description: Everybody sweats, it’s natural. But sweat should not hold you back. Sweating can feel like a daily fight, but it’s no match for our Sure Advanced Protection for women. To combat sweating and help you stay dry and fresh, Sure has developed breakthrough Advanced Technology that creates an anti-sweat micro shield to prevent sweat for 72 hours. Our patented Advanced Protection range gives you 2x more powerful protection* – it’s our best ever protection in an aerosol, giving you one less thing to worry about. Sure Advanced Protection anti-perspirant deodorant works to prevent sweat and odour caused by motion, stress or heat, so whether you are looking for daily protection, or an added boost for a specific moment, it won’t let you down. It includes our Motion Activated technology which means the more you move, the more it works. Feel unstoppable and fresh all day, with this 72-hour anti-perspirant spray. Spray the aerosol daily to clean, dry underarms. Sure Advanced Protection. It won’t let you down. *2x more effective at 72 hours vs. Sure core deodorants.

Name: Vo5 Extreme Style Texturising Gum 75Ml
Description: Vo5 Texturising Gum provides a long-lasting extra firm hold and is ideal to shape your hair. This hair styling product works great for short to mid-length cuts. Our Texturising Gum is ideal to manipulate your hair in any direction creating your extreme style. And yes, this Vo5 hair gum is easy to work in and wash out. With the hold level of 5/5, our Vo5 styling gum gets the hair styling out of your hair for the rest of the day. Improvise and use the Vo5 men's styling gum to create either day time or evening natural hairstyles. For best results: Use on either dry or damp hair. Rub a small amount of Vo5 Texturising Gum between your fingers, open the hands to stretch out the hair gum and run through your hair. Style tip: Use sparingly, a little goes a long way. Add more if needed. If you liked the Vo5 Texturising Gum, be sure to check out the other Vo5 styling products in the full range like our Hair Fibre, Hair Paste, Hair Clay or Hair Putty to remix your style and experiment with your hair even further! Don’t forget to leave a product review and share your best styling tips. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, rinse well with water immediately. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

Our patented Advanced Protection range gives you 2x more powerful protection*. It’s our best protection in a roll on, giving you one less thing to worry about. This Advanced Protection anti-perspirant deodorant for women works to prevent sweat and odour caused by motion, stress or heat, so whether you are looking for daily protection, or an added boost for a specific moment, it won’t let you down. It includes our Motion Activated technology which means the more you move, the more it works. Feel unstoppable and fresh all day, with this 72-hour roll on deodorant. Apply this anti-perspirant deodorant daily to clean, dry underarms. Sure Advanced Protection. It won’t let you down. Name: Lynx Africa Body Spray 35Ml
Description: Lynx Africa Body Spray 35ml is part of the Lynx male grooming range and has been our best selling deodorant body spray for over a decade. An exotic mixture of warm African spices and aromas, this classic fragrance will give you a real presence. A few quick sprays are all you need for a long lasting, great smelling fragrance that makes a lasting impression. Stay fresh all day with Lynx Body Sprays. How to use it. Shaking the can well and holding it 15cm away from your chest and body, spray in a well-ventilated area for great protection from style threatening odour. Whatever the occasion, it lasts all day long. Avoid contact with your eyes and broken skin. Stop use if rash or irritation occurs. Lynx Africa Body Spray is in a travel friendly bottle so you can take your favourite body spray with you wherever you go! Want more? Now available as a 48 hour Anti-Perspirant, this classic men’s fragrance is designed to keep you cool and dry no matter where the heat's coming from. Boost your sweat protection with Lynx Africa Anti-Perspirant 150ml and try it alongside our Lynx Africa Body Wash 250ml.
